main event: A saucer-shaped object the size of a baseball appeared to circle over Dodge City, Kansas, emitting giant sparks.
interesting points: The object moved at a high speed, circling and stopping abruptly before making a sharp turn.
The object emitted a strange humming sound and glowed brightly, briefly blinding the observers.
The object hovered motionless for several minutes before suddenly disappearing.
The observers could not estimate the altitude of the object due to its brightness.
Similar sightings of unidentified aerial objects had been reported in the area.
photographs: No photographs included in the report
